mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (username, password, email, nickname, score, level, total_games, win_games, lose_games, draw_games, status, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{email}, #{nickname}, 1000, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: update user set totalCount = totalCount + 1, winCount = winCount + 1, score = score + 10 where userId = #{userId}
